data_variables.name: df
data_variables.description: DataFrame object which is used in plotting functions.

data_variables.name: nGraphShown
data_variables.description: Number of graphs to show in the distribution plots.

data_variables.name: nGraphPerRow
data_variables.description: Number of graphs to display per row in the distribution plots.

data_variables.name: graphWidth
data_variables.description: Width of the graph for correlation matrix visualization.

data_variables.name: plotSize
data_variables.description: Size of the scatter plot matrix.

data_variables.name: textSize
data_variables.description: Size of the text annotations in the scatter plots.

data_flow.creation: Not explicitly created in this notebook; intended to be passed to plotting functions.
data_flow.flow: Used in plotting functions such as plotPerColumnDistribution, plotCorrelationMatrix, and plotScatterMatrix.
